profile.name: Lin Zexin
profile.title: AI Researcher & Computer Engineer
profile.summary: I am a Master's student in AI & Robotics at CUHK-Shenzhen, specializing in Embodied AI, Cognitive Architectures, and High-Performance Computing. I have extensive experience in building autonomous agent systems, simulation environments, and large-scale data analysis pipelines.
profile.about: I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence and Robotics at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen, where I also serve as the Class Monitor. My research interests lie in Embodied AI, Cognitive Architectures, and Robotics. I have led multiple research projects involving autonomous agents, VLM hallucination evaluation, and UAV control systems. I am passionate about bridging the gap between high-level cognitive reasoning and low-level physical control.

research_experience.description: Designed and implemented an agent architecture with emotional and cognitive continuity. Built a memory system prototype with multi-level long-term memory writing, retrieval, and update mechanisms. Built and maintained agent experimental platforms, integrating LLMs, vector databases, and affective computing modules. Developed emotional interaction and self-awareness test environments to validate continuous memory and state evolution in multi-turn interactions.

Built and maintained server environments, deployed Unity Editor, Unity ML-Agents, CUDA, and Python environments. Developed simulation environments and simulated VTOL UAVs (PID & Neural Network controllers). Designed and implemented validation experiments for simulated and real VTOL UAVs. Implemented full-duplex communication interfaces between hardware/simulation and simulation/RL models.

Built and maintained high-performance server hardware and development environments (GPU/CPU selection, network management, CUDA, Redis, Spark, C++, Python, Java, Jupyter, Docker). Participated in system design and data structure setup. Developed backend modules like databases and high-performance C++ matrix operations.
Completed and integrated the character control system for 'CUHKSZ Metaverse'. Included Unity C# controller scripts, character animation, state machines, and communication interfaces.
Collaborated on building server environments (Redis, Spark, Python, Java, Jupyter, Docker, Neo4j). Proposed and developed a subsystem for extracting AS autonomous system relationships from DNS logs.
Technical Reviewer for International Conference on AI and Robotics, IEEE ROBIO.

profile.name: 林泽昕
profile.title: AI研究员 & 计算机工程师
profile.summary: 我是香港中文大学（深圳）人工智能与机器人专业的硕士研究生，专注于具身智能、认知架构和高性能计算。我在构建自主智能体系统、仿真环境和大规模数据分析流程方面拥有丰富的经验。
profile.about: 我目前在香港中文大学（深圳）攻读人工智能与机器人硕士学位，并担任班长。我的研究兴趣在于具身智能、认知架构和机器人技术。我领导了多个涉及自主智能体、VLM幻觉评估和无人机控制系统的研究项目。我热衷于弥合高层认知推理与底层物理控制之间的鸿沟。

构建和维护高性能服务器硬件和开发环境，包括GPU/CPU选型、网络管理、CUDA、redis、spark。C++、python和java开发环境、jupyter Notebook、docker等。参与系统设计和数据结构搭建。开发数据库、高性能C++矩阵运算等后端模块。
